text: Roland Chassain (5 February 1947 – 9 February 2021) was a French politician. He was born in Aurillac, France. Chassain was a member of the Rally for the Republic. From 2002 to 2007, he was a member of the National Assembly. From 1995 until his death, he was Mayor of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer. Chassain died on 9 February 2021, aged 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Cantal Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône- Alpes
title: Roland Chassain
